    • dealWithAlreadyProcessedVertex

      private static void dealWithAlreadyProcessedVertex​(@NotNull @NotNull Vertex previousVertex, int newTextureIndex, int newNormalIndex, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> indices, java.util.List<Vertex> vertices)
      When a vertex has the same textures and normals it gets processed more efficiently here.
      Parameters:
      previousVertex - Vertex this is the previous Vertex.
      newTextureIndex - int This is the index of the new Texture.
      newNormalIndex - int this is the index of the new Normal.
      indices - List this is a list of the indices.
      vertices - List this is a list of the vertices.
